author: James Howett 🔰
text: 11 hours sleep! Can’t beat a lay in from time to time! 👌🏻😁💤 #Refreshed

author: James Howett 🔰
text: Simply would have signed @JackGrealish for United! Heard there was a deal in place for £60m if Villa went down but he kept them up! What a player! IMO, I’d have signed him over Sancho all day! Still he’s a Utd fan as we know by his old tweets so I’ll take that! 😉🇾🇪 #Baller #MUFC https://t.co/G6TlcRm4gt https://t.co/AD3pyAEzys

author: James Howett 🔰
text:
I am always #OleIn! Fans should be backing our manager but not just any manager, he’s one of us! 💪🏻

It hurt, yes! Would I put myself through watching it again getting drubbed 0-5, absolutely! You should always support even more so when it gets tough! 

#UTFR’s #MUFC 🇾🇪 #MUNLIV https://t.co/qTBgFoPWGz

author: James Howett 🔰
text: From @ChrisD_Cooper's pass i bagged this worldie of a strike on the way to our first league title! #ProClubs #PS5Share, #FIFA22 https://t.co/NUnjaPBcdZ

author: James Howett 🔰
James Howett 🔰
text:
Hate to see what Barça is doing to Piqué, a player I wished had succeed at United! 😢

Mentality, leadership, quality but had Vida and Rio in front of him! 😔

I hope things pick up for him but you are always welcome back where you was made, @3gerardpique! 😉🇾🇪 

#UCL #FCB #MUFC https://t.co/nc81iYPsvF

author: James Howett 🔰
text:
Wow! @SteveBartlettSC’s self help book - one of the best I have read!
🙂Happy is more than just what people put on SM!
⏳Living my life in as if a sand timer of my remaining life time was w/ me!
💡My time is worth a lot if I give it!
💯I live my life, others can’t tell me how to! https://t.co/LZWB5fqGhB

author: James Howett 🔰

If he goes down this road by wearing blue, he disrespects Man Utd, Sir Alex and us as fans! Don’t do it Ronaldo! 🇾🇪 #MUFC #MCFC https://t.co/x8DxrlJe8l

text:
Loving my new #MUFC shirt! 🦓🇾🇪

What do you think, @AT13Oficial? 😉  #UEL  #AT27 https://t.co/EgJByeODzt

author: James Howett 🔰
text: Watched @MicahRichards #tacklingracism again recently, what a great doc! 👏🏻 When people are racist, it makes me shudder and my blood boil in anger! 😡 No matter what age/era you are from, it’s unacceptable! A subject I am passionate about! More needs to be done! All equal! 🤜🏻🤛🏿 https://t.co/xRAsheNAeu

author: James Howett 🔰
text: Absolutely loved the show Micah, great insight from all races and backgrounds giving their views and how we solve the problem 🤜🏻 Still lots to be done from all races to stop this issue! 🤔 This show has definitely helped the cause to end all types of racism! 💯 #TacklingRacism https://t.co/tPm9zh9Btw

author: James Howett 🔰
text: Honestly, this makes my blood boil that Woodward’s dithering again 🤬has cost us, @NathanAke! Said it time and time again... #Ake is the ideal replacement for a few CB’s were shipping out this summer. City go in with the oil money - Transfer done! 🙄⛽️💰 #MUFC https://t.co/iAMLeNy2gP

author: James Howett 🔰
text: Huge Respect for #EddieHowe! 🙌🏻 I’m currently reading a book about this journey on #AFCB. After stepping down as manager, he took his home town team back from the brink of extinction to… https://t.co/dRUV5a8bgN

author: James Howett 🔰
text: Don’t understand why we haven’t bid for @NathanAke, yet?! 🙄 Ole said to him “We need a left-footed centre-back, so keep going”. Plus #Ake would get more minutes with us than at #MCFC, with Smalling and Jones being sold this summer... 🤔 #MUFC #AFCB https://t.co/PkpecZW5Q3

author: James Howett 🔰
text:
Sad to see a great manager like Eddie Howe this emotional, he eat sleeps & breaths, #AFCB. Play some great football. Just a shame the 2 long ball merchants above them stay in the PL, PL less attractive next season.

If he stays, he’ll bring them back up. No doubt! 👏🏻🍒 #EVEBOU https://t.co/6Y8hfpG1Wf

author: James Howett 🔰
text: Just finished watching #TheLastDance! 🏀 you guys know it when I say this is probably the greatest documentary to have been produced! @Jumpman23’s mentality, but also to drag his team mates to the heights to compete for the historic 6, was nothing short of TBE in the NBA! 🔥💯👏🏻

author: James Howett 🔰
text: Probably one of the greatest books I have read on my favourite boxer in @Carl_Froch! 📖 Never took the easy route in fights. In the book, it took me to parts to where my very own Midlands heritage is! Calling Calzaghe a ‘bottle job’ 😂 and that punch vs Groves!👊🏻 @frochonfighting https://t.co/bHTfzVQEDj

author: James Howett 🔰
text:
Really enjoyed reading @louissaha’s book over the last few weeks in #lockdown.

A story of not what everyone thinks a footballer goes through but the highs, lows, dealing, insecurities, money, injuries and of course our beloved #MUFC!

Definitely recommend it! 📓💯🇾🇪 https://t.co/comsaoz4pX

author: James Howett 🔰
text: Great to see @B_Fernandes8’s debut for United 🇵🇹 and also to pay respects to the Busby babes of 1958 🙌🏻 but a drab 0-0 vs Wolves was disappointing... 😕🇾🇪🐺 #MUFC #ManUtd #LUHG https://t.co/tNPP2FVKNb
